messages.content: Given a batch of Chinese product models, please provide the product model , provide the following fields in English in a JSON dict, where applicable, Some of it can be inferred based on common sense: "Size" (inch), "Color", "notes".
Given a sports headline, provide the following fields in a JSON dict, where applicable: "player" (full name), "team", "sport", and "gender".
Sources: Colts grant RB Taylor OK to seek trade
